akn:section.akn:heading: Sense of Congress regarding negotiations with North Korea

akn:content.akn:p: § 7811. Sense of Congress regarding negotiations with North Korea It is the sense of Congress that the human rights of North Koreans should remain a key element in future negotiations between the United States, North Korea, and other concerned parties in Northeast Asia. (Pub. L. 108–333, title I, § 101, Oct. 18, 2004, 118 Stat. 1290.)
